title: VA -  Fascinatin' Rhythm (Capitol Sings George Gershwin)@
description:
This is a collection of Gershwin songs, sung by artists who recorded for Capitol Records during the years 1943-1966, the bulk of which are from the 50&#039;s.

All tracks have been digitally remastered.



Fascinatin&#039; Rhythm: Capitol Sings Gershwin is a very enjoyable sampler, featuring a generous selection of Capitol recording artists singing many of the best items in George Gershwin&#039;s catalog. Every featured artist more or less fits into the "traditional pop vocal" category, but there&#039;s enough variety in their vocals and arrangements to make this a varied, consistently entertaining listen. (AMG)




01. Freddy Martin & His Orchestra - Rhapsody In Blue                                                                    
02. Dorothy Donegan - A Foggy Day                                                                                       
03. Margaret Whiting - But Not For Me                                                                                   
04. The &#039;Nat King Cole&#039; Trio - Embraceable you                                                                          
05. Vic Damone - Fascinatin&#039; Rhythm                                                                                     
06. Ann Richards - I Got Rhythm                                                                                         
07. Liza Minnelli - I&#039;ll Build A Stairway To Paradise                                                                   
08. Ella Mae Morse - It Ain&#039;t Necessarily So                                                                            
09. Marian McPartland - Let&#039;s Call The Whole Thing Off                                                                  
10. Jeri Southern - Nice Work If You Can Get It                                                                         
11. The Andrews Sisters - Of Thee I Sing                                                                                
12. Julie London - &#039;s Wonderful                                                                                         
13. Jean Turner - Someone To Watch Over Me                                                                              
14. Tony Bennett - Strike Up The Band                                                                                   
15. Gordon Macrae - Summertime                                                                                          
16. Judy Garland - Swanee                                                                                               
17. Dakota Station - They All Laughed                                                                                   
18. Peggy Lee - They Can&#039;t Take That Away From Me                                                                       
19. June Christy - How Long Has This Been Goin&#039; On                                                                      
20. Jo Ann Greer - That Certain Feeling                                                                                 
21. Kate Smith - Who Cares (As Long As You Care For Me)                                                                 
22. Kenny Gardner - I Got Plenty Of Nuttin&#039;                                                                             
23. Keely Smith - The Man I Love                                                                                        
24. Anna Maria Alberghetti - I&#039;ve Got A Crush On You
